Text:
What to do ... what to do ...

Watch this and then skip through 2/3 in two days' time when the XL appears ... or wait for the full version?
I watch the regular versions as they come out, but download XLs as well. XL versions can be watched after the season is over - they will feel fresh and new. Thus, one can double the enjoyment :)
Great upload, and, as usual, one the first to upload. Thanks :)
